## [2.0.0-develop.1](https://github.com/Setup-Automatizado/zedaapi/compare/v1.2.0-develop.3...v2.0.0-develop.1) (2026-02-13)

### ‚ö† BREAKING CHANGES

* **events:** Events with waitingMessage=true and receipts from
secondary devices are now filtered by default. Set the corresponding
environment variables to false to restore previous behavior.
* **terraform:** Replace containerized data stores with AWS managed
services (RDS PostgreSQL, ElastiCache Redis, S3) for improved
reliability, scalability, and operational efficiency.

New Terraform Modules:
- RDS PostgreSQL with Multi-AZ, automated backups, encryption
- ElastiCache Redis with replication and automatic failover
- S3 buckets with versioning, encryption, lifecycle policies

Module Refactoring:
- ECS Service: Simplified to API-only container, removed Postgres/Redis/MinIO
- Security Groups: Added RDS and ElastiCache SGs, removed EFS
- Secrets Manager: Flexible payload structure per environment

Environment Migration:
Production:
- RDS db.r6g.large Multi-AZ, 100GB gp3, 7-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.r6g.large with 2 replicas
- S3 whatsmeow-production-media
- Cost: ~$575/month

Staging:
- RDS db.t4g.medium single-AZ, 20GB, 3-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small with 1 replica
- FARGATE_SPOT enabled
- Cost: ~$126/month

Homolog:
- RDS db.t4g.small single-AZ, 10GB, 1-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small no replicas
- FARGATE_SPOT, NAT Gateway disabled
- Cost: ~$84/month

Documentation:
- Updated architecture diagram with managed services
- New cost breakdown per environment
- Updated troubleshooting for RDS/ElastiCache/S3
- Removed EFS and container-based service documentation

Benefits:
- Automated backups and point-in-time recovery
- Managed patching and maintenance
- Better scalability with auto-scaling support
- Enhanced security with encryption at rest/transit
- Reduced operational complexity

## [2.0.0-develop.1](https://github.com/Setup-Automatizado/zedaapi/compare/v1.2.0-develop.3...v2.0.0-develop.1) (2026-02-13)

### ‚ö† BREAKING CHANGES

* **events:** Events with waitingMessage=true and receipts from
secondary devices are now filtered by default. Set the corresponding
environment variables to false to restore previous behavior.
* **terraform:** Replace containerized data stores with AWS managed
services (RDS PostgreSQL, ElastiCache Redis, S3) for improved
reliability, scalability, and operational efficiency.

New Terraform Modules:
- RDS PostgreSQL with Multi-AZ, automated backups, encryption
- ElastiCache Redis with replication and automatic failover
- S3 buckets with versioning, encryption, lifecycle policies

Module Refactoring:
- ECS Service: Simplified to API-only container, removed Postgres/Redis/MinIO
- Security Groups: Added RDS and ElastiCache SGs, removed EFS
- Secrets Manager: Flexible payload structure per environment

Environment Migration:
Production:
- RDS db.r6g.large Multi-AZ, 100GB gp3, 7-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.r6g.large with 2 replicas
- S3 whatsmeow-production-media
- Cost: ~$575/month

Staging:
- RDS db.t4g.medium single-AZ, 20GB, 3-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small with 1 replica
- FARGATE_SPOT enabled
- Cost: ~$126/month

Homolog:
- RDS db.t4g.small single-AZ, 10GB, 1-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small no replicas
- FARGATE_SPOT, NAT Gateway disabled
- Cost: ~$84/month

Documentation:
- Updated architecture diagram with managed services
- New cost breakdown per environment
- Updated troubleshooting for RDS/ElastiCache/S3
- Removed EFS and container-based service documentation

Benefits:
- Automated backups and point-in-time recovery
- Managed patching and maintenance
- Better scalability with auto-scaling support
- Enhanced security with encryption at rest/transit
- Reduced operational complexity

## [2.0.0-develop.1](https://github.com/Setup-Automatizado/zedaapi/compare/v1.2.0-develop.3...v2.0.0-develop.1) (2026-02-12)

### ‚ö† BREAKING CHANGES

* **events:** Events with waitingMessage=true and receipts from
secondary devices are now filtered by default. Set the corresponding
environment variables to false to restore previous behavior.
* **terraform:** Replace containerized data stores with AWS managed
services (RDS PostgreSQL, ElastiCache Redis, S3) for improved
reliability, scalability, and operational efficiency.

New Terraform Modules:
- RDS PostgreSQL with Multi-AZ, automated backups, encryption
- ElastiCache Redis with replication and automatic failover
- S3 buckets with versioning, encryption, lifecycle policies

Module Refactoring:
- ECS Service: Simplified to API-only container, removed Postgres/Redis/MinIO
- Security Groups: Added RDS and ElastiCache SGs, removed EFS
- Secrets Manager: Flexible payload structure per environment

Environment Migration:
Production:
- RDS db.r6g.large Multi-AZ, 100GB gp3, 7-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.r6g.large with 2 replicas
- S3 whatsmeow-production-media
- Cost: ~$575/month

Staging:
- RDS db.t4g.medium single-AZ, 20GB, 3-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small with 1 replica
- FARGATE_SPOT enabled
- Cost: ~$126/month

Homolog:
- RDS db.t4g.small single-AZ, 10GB, 1-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small no replicas
- FARGATE_SPOT, NAT Gateway disabled
- Cost: ~$84/month

Documentation:
- Updated architecture diagram with managed services
- New cost breakdown per environment
- Updated troubleshooting for RDS/ElastiCache/S3
- Removed EFS and container-based service documentation

Benefits:
- Automated backups and point-in-time recovery
- Managed patching and maintenance
- Better scalability with auto-scaling support
- Enhanced security with encryption at rest/transit
- Reduced operational complexity

## [2.0.0-develop.1](https://github.com/Setup-Automatizado/zedaapi/compare/v1.2.0-develop.3...v2.0.0-develop.1) (2026-01-27)

### ‚ö† BREAKING CHANGES

* **events:** Events with waitingMessage=true and receipts from
secondary devices are now filtered by default. Set the corresponding
environment variables to false to restore previous behavior.
* **terraform:** Replace containerized data stores with AWS managed
services (RDS PostgreSQL, ElastiCache Redis, S3) for improved
reliability, scalability, and operational efficiency.

New Terraform Modules:
- RDS PostgreSQL with Multi-AZ, automated backups, encryption
- ElastiCache Redis with replication and automatic failover
- S3 buckets with versioning, encryption, lifecycle policies

Module Refactoring:
- ECS Service: Simplified to API-only container, removed Postgres/Redis/MinIO
- Security Groups: Added RDS and ElastiCache SGs, removed EFS
- Secrets Manager: Flexible payload structure per environment

Environment Migration:
Production:
- RDS db.r6g.large Multi-AZ, 100GB gp3, 7-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.r6g.large with 2 replicas
- S3 whatsmeow-production-media
- Cost: ~$575/month

Staging:
- RDS db.t4g.medium single-AZ, 20GB, 3-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small with 1 replica
- FARGATE_SPOT enabled
- Cost: ~$126/month

Homolog:
- RDS db.t4g.small single-AZ, 10GB, 1-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small no replicas
- FARGATE_SPOT, NAT Gateway disabled
- Cost: ~$84/month

Documentation:
- Updated architecture diagram with managed services
- New cost breakdown per environment
- Updated troubleshooting for RDS/ElastiCache/S3
- Removed EFS and container-based service documentation

Benefits:
- Automated backups and point-in-time recovery
- Managed patching and maintenance
- Better scalability with auto-scaling support
- Enhanced security with encryption at rest/transit
- Reduced operational complexity

## [2.0.0-develop.1](https://github.com/Setup-Automatizado/zedaapi/compare/v1.2.0-develop.3...v2.0.0-develop.1) (2026-01-26)

### ‚ö† BREAKING CHANGES

* **events:** Events with waitingMessage=true and receipts from
secondary devices are now filtered by default. Set the corresponding
environment variables to false to restore previous behavior.
* **terraform:** Replace containerized data stores with AWS managed
services (RDS PostgreSQL, ElastiCache Redis, S3) for improved
reliability, scalability, and operational efficiency.

New Terraform Modules:
- RDS PostgreSQL with Multi-AZ, automated backups, encryption
- ElastiCache Redis with replication and automatic failover
- S3 buckets with versioning, encryption, lifecycle policies

Module Refactoring:
- ECS Service: Simplified to API-only container, removed Postgres/Redis/MinIO
- Security Groups: Added RDS and ElastiCache SGs, removed EFS
- Secrets Manager: Flexible payload structure per environment

Environment Migration:
Production:
- RDS db.r6g.large Multi-AZ, 100GB gp3, 7-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.r6g.large with 2 replicas
- S3 whatsmeow-production-media
- Cost: ~$575/month

Staging:
- RDS db.t4g.medium single-AZ, 20GB, 3-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small with 1 replica
- FARGATE_SPOT enabled
- Cost: ~$126/month

Homolog:
- RDS db.t4g.small single-AZ, 10GB, 1-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small no replicas
- FARGATE_SPOT, NAT Gateway disabled
- Cost: ~$84/month

Documentation:
- Updated architecture diagram with managed services
- New cost breakdown per environment
- Updated troubleshooting for RDS/ElastiCache/S3
- Removed EFS and container-based service documentation

Benefits:
- Automated backups and point-in-time recovery
- Managed patching and maintenance
- Better scalability with auto-scaling support
- Enhanced security with encryption at rest/transit
- Reduced operational complexity

## [2.0.0-develop.1](https://github.com/Setup-Automatizado/zedaapi/compare/v1.2.0-develop.3...v2.0.0-develop.1) (2026-01-26)

### ‚ö† BREAKING CHANGES

* **events:** Events with waitingMessage=true and receipts from
secondary devices are now filtered by default. Set the corresponding
environment variables to false to restore previous behavior.
* **terraform:** Replace containerized data stores with AWS managed
services (RDS PostgreSQL, ElastiCache Redis, S3) for improved
reliability, scalability, and operational efficiency.

New Terraform Modules:
- RDS PostgreSQL with Multi-AZ, automated backups, encryption
- ElastiCache Redis with replication and automatic failover
- S3 buckets with versioning, encryption, lifecycle policies

Module Refactoring:
- ECS Service: Simplified to API-only container, removed Postgres/Redis/MinIO
- Security Groups: Added RDS and ElastiCache SGs, removed EFS
- Secrets Manager: Flexible payload structure per environment

Environment Migration:
Production:
- RDS db.r6g.large Multi-AZ, 100GB gp3, 7-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.r6g.large with 2 replicas
- S3 whatsmeow-production-media
- Cost: ~$575/month

Staging:
- RDS db.t4g.medium single-AZ, 20GB, 3-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small with 1 replica
- FARGATE_SPOT enabled
- Cost: ~$126/month

Homolog:
- RDS db.t4g.small single-AZ, 10GB, 1-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small no replicas
- FARGATE_SPOT, NAT Gateway disabled
- Cost: ~$84/month

Documentation:
- Updated architecture diagram with managed services
- New cost breakdown per environment
- Updated troubleshooting for RDS/ElastiCache/S3
- Removed EFS and container-based service documentation

Benefits:
- Automated backups and point-in-time recovery
- Managed patching and maintenance
- Better scalability with auto-scaling support
- Enhanced security with encryption at rest/transit
- Reduced operational complexity

## [2.0.0-develop.1](https://github.com/Setup-Automatizado/zedaapi/compare/v1.2.0-develop.3...v2.0.0-develop.1) (2026-01-23)

### ‚ö† BREAKING CHANGES

* **events:** Events with waitingMessage=true and receipts from
secondary devices are now filtered by default. Set the corresponding
environment variables to false to restore previous behavior.
* **terraform:** Replace containerized data stores with AWS managed
services (RDS PostgreSQL, ElastiCache Redis, S3) for improved
reliability, scalability, and operational efficiency.

New Terraform Modules:
- RDS PostgreSQL with Multi-AZ, automated backups, encryption
- ElastiCache Redis with replication and automatic failover
- S3 buckets with versioning, encryption, lifecycle policies

Module Refactoring:
- ECS Service: Simplified to API-only container, removed Postgres/Redis/MinIO
- Security Groups: Added RDS and ElastiCache SGs, removed EFS
- Secrets Manager: Flexible payload structure per environment

Environment Migration:
Production:
- RDS db.r6g.large Multi-AZ, 100GB gp3, 7-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.r6g.large with 2 replicas
- S3 whatsmeow-production-media
- Cost: ~$575/month

Staging:
- RDS db.t4g.medium single-AZ, 20GB, 3-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small with 1 replica
- FARGATE_SPOT enabled
- Cost: ~$126/month

Homolog:
- RDS db.t4g.small single-AZ, 10GB, 1-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small no replicas
- FARGATE_SPOT, NAT Gateway disabled
- Cost: ~$84/month

Documentation:
- Updated architecture diagram with managed services
- New cost breakdown per environment
- Updated troubleshooting for RDS/ElastiCache/S3
- Removed EFS and container-based service documentation

Benefits:
- Automated backups and point-in-time recovery
- Managed patching and maintenance
- Better scalability with auto-scaling support
- Enhanced security with encryption at rest/transit
- Reduced operational complexity

## [2.0.0-develop.1](https://github.com/Setup-Automatizado/zedaapi/compare/v1.2.0-develop.3...v2.0.0-develop.1) (2026-01-23)

### ‚ö† BREAKING CHANGES

* **events:** Events with waitingMessage=true and receipts from
secondary devices are now filtered by default. Set the corresponding
environment variables to false to restore previous behavior.
* **terraform:** Replace containerized data stores with AWS managed
services (RDS PostgreSQL, ElastiCache Redis, S3) for improved
reliability, scalability, and operational efficiency.

New Terraform Modules:
- RDS PostgreSQL with Multi-AZ, automated backups, encryption
- ElastiCache Redis with replication and automatic failover
- S3 buckets with versioning, encryption, lifecycle policies

Module Refactoring:
- ECS Service: Simplified to API-only container, removed Postgres/Redis/MinIO
- Security Groups: Added RDS and ElastiCache SGs, removed EFS
- Secrets Manager: Flexible payload structure per environment

Environment Migration:
Production:
- RDS db.r6g.large Multi-AZ, 100GB gp3, 7-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.r6g.large with 2 replicas
- S3 whatsmeow-production-media
- Cost: ~$575/month

Staging:
- RDS db.t4g.medium single-AZ, 20GB, 3-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small with 1 replica
- FARGATE_SPOT enabled
- Cost: ~$126/month

Homolog:
- RDS db.t4g.small single-AZ, 10GB, 1-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small no replicas
- FARGATE_SPOT, NAT Gateway disabled
- Cost: ~$84/month

Documentation:
- Updated architecture diagram with managed services
- New cost breakdown per environment
- Updated troubleshooting for RDS/ElastiCache/S3
- Removed EFS and container-based service documentation

Benefits:
- Automated backups and point-in-time recovery
- Managed patching and maintenance
- Better scalability with auto-scaling support
- Enhanced security with encryption at rest/transit
- Reduced operational complexity

## [2.0.0-develop.1](https://github.com/Setup-Automatizado/zedaapi/compare/v1.2.0-develop.3...v2.0.0-develop.1) (2026-01-23)

### ‚ö† BREAKING CHANGES

* **events:** Events with waitingMessage=true and receipts from
secondary devices are now filtered by default. Set the corresponding
environment variables to false to restore previous behavior.
* **terraform:** Replace containerized data stores with AWS managed
services (RDS PostgreSQL, ElastiCache Redis, S3) for improved
reliability, scalability, and operational efficiency.

New Terraform Modules:
- RDS PostgreSQL with Multi-AZ, automated backups, encryption
- ElastiCache Redis with replication and automatic failover
- S3 buckets with versioning, encryption, lifecycle policies

Module Refactoring:
- ECS Service: Simplified to API-only container, removed Postgres/Redis/MinIO
- Security Groups: Added RDS and ElastiCache SGs, removed EFS
- Secrets Manager: Flexible payload structure per environment

Environment Migration:
Production:
- RDS db.r6g.large Multi-AZ, 100GB gp3, 7-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.r6g.large with 2 replicas
- S3 whatsmeow-production-media
- Cost: ~$575/month

Staging:
- RDS db.t4g.medium single-AZ, 20GB, 3-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small with 1 replica
- FARGATE_SPOT enabled
- Cost: ~$126/month

Homolog:
- RDS db.t4g.small single-AZ, 10GB, 1-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small no replicas
- FARGATE_SPOT, NAT Gateway disabled
- Cost: ~$84/month

Documentation:
- Updated architecture diagram with managed services
- New cost breakdown per environment
- Updated troubleshooting for RDS/ElastiCache/S3
- Removed EFS and container-based service documentation

Benefits:
- Automated backups and point-in-time recovery
- Managed patching and maintenance
- Better scalability with auto-scaling support
- Enhanced security with encryption at rest/transit
- Reduced operational complexity

## [2.0.0-develop.1](https://github.com/Setup-Automatizado/zedaapi/compare/v1.2.0-develop.3...v2.0.0-develop.1) (2026-01-15)

### ‚ö† BREAKING CHANGES

* **events:** Events with waitingMessage=true and receipts from
secondary devices are now filtered by default. Set the corresponding
environment variables to false to restore previous behavior.
* **terraform:** Replace containerized data stores with AWS managed
services (RDS PostgreSQL, ElastiCache Redis, S3) for improved
reliability, scalability, and operational efficiency.

New Terraform Modules:
- RDS PostgreSQL with Multi-AZ, automated backups, encryption
- ElastiCache Redis with replication and automatic failover
- S3 buckets with versioning, encryption, lifecycle policies

Module Refactoring:
- ECS Service: Simplified to API-only container, removed Postgres/Redis/MinIO
- Security Groups: Added RDS and ElastiCache SGs, removed EFS
- Secrets Manager: Flexible payload structure per environment

Environment Migration:
Production:
- RDS db.r6g.large Multi-AZ, 100GB gp3, 7-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.r6g.large with 2 replicas
- S3 whatsmeow-production-media
- Cost: ~$575/month

Staging:
- RDS db.t4g.medium single-AZ, 20GB, 3-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small with 1 replica
- FARGATE_SPOT enabled
- Cost: ~$126/month

Homolog:
- RDS db.t4g.small single-AZ, 10GB, 1-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small no replicas
- FARGATE_SPOT, NAT Gateway disabled
- Cost: ~$84/month

Documentation:
- Updated architecture diagram with managed services
- New cost breakdown per environment
- Updated troubleshooting for RDS/ElastiCache/S3
- Removed EFS and container-based service documentation

Benefits:
- Automated backups and point-in-time recovery
- Managed patching and maintenance
- Better scalability with auto-scaling support

## [2.0.0-develop.1](https://github.com/Setup-Automatizado/zedaapi/compare/v1.2.0-develop.3...v2.0.0-develop.1) (2026-01-15)

### ‚ö† BREAKING CHANGES

* **events:** Events with waitingMessage=true and receipts from
secondary devices are now filtered by default. Set the corresponding
environment variables to false to restore previous behavior.
* **terraform:** Replace containerized data stores with AWS managed
services (RDS PostgreSQL, ElastiCache Redis, S3) for improved
reliability, scalability, and operational efficiency.

New Terraform Modules:
- RDS PostgreSQL with Multi-AZ, automated backups, encryption
- ElastiCache Redis with replication and automatic failover
- S3 buckets with versioning, encryption, lifecycle policies

Module Refactoring:
- ECS Service: Simplified to API-only container, removed Postgres/Redis/MinIO
- Security Groups: Added RDS and ElastiCache SGs, removed EFS
- Secrets Manager: Flexible payload structure per environment

Environment Migration:
Production:
- RDS db.r6g.large Multi-AZ, 100GB gp3, 7-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.r6g.large with 2 replicas
- S3 whatsmeow-production-media
- Cost: ~$575/month

Staging:
- RDS db.t4g.medium single-AZ, 20GB, 3-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small with 1 replica
- FARGATE_SPOT enabled
- Cost: ~$126/month

Homolog:
- RDS db.t4g.small single-AZ, 10GB, 1-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small no replicas
- FARGATE_SPOT, NAT Gateway disabled
- Cost: ~$84/month

Documentation:
- Updated architecture diagram with managed services
- New cost breakdown per environment
- Updated troubleshooting for RDS/ElastiCache/S3
- Removed EFS and container-based service documentation

Benefits:
- Automated backups and point-in-time recovery
- Managed patching and maintenance
- Better scalability with auto-scaling support
- Enhanced security with encryption at rest/transit
- Reduced operational complexity

## [2.0.0-develop.1](https://github.com/Setup-Automatizado/zedaapi/compare/v1.2.0-develop.3...v2.0.0-develop.1) (2026-01-14)

### ‚ö† BREAKING CHANGES

* **events:** Events with waitingMessage=true and receipts from
secondary devices are now filtered by default. Set the corresponding
environment variables to false to restore previous behavior.
* **terraform:** Replace containerized data stores with AWS managed
services (RDS PostgreSQL, ElastiCache Redis, S3) for improved
reliability, scalability, and operational efficiency.

New Terraform Modules:
- RDS PostgreSQL with Multi-AZ, automated backups, encryption
- ElastiCache Redis with replication and automatic failover
- S3 buckets with versioning, encryption, lifecycle policies

Module Refactoring:
- ECS Service: Simplified to API-only container, removed Postgres/Redis/MinIO
- Security Groups: Added RDS and ElastiCache SGs, removed EFS
- Secrets Manager: Flexible payload structure per environment

Environment Migration:
Production:
- RDS db.r6g.large Multi-AZ, 100GB gp3, 7-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.r6g.large with 2 replicas
- S3 whatsmeow-production-media
- Cost: ~$575/month

Staging:
- RDS db.t4g.medium single-AZ, 20GB, 3-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small with 1 replica
- FARGATE_SPOT enabled
- Cost: ~$126/month

Homolog:
- RDS db.t4g.small single-AZ, 10GB, 1-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small no replicas
- FARGATE_SPOT, NAT Gateway disabled
- Cost: ~$84/month

Documentation:
- Updated architecture diagram with managed services
- New cost breakdown per environment
- Updated troubleshooting for RDS/ElastiCache/S3
- Removed EFS and container-based service documentation

Benefits:
- Automated backups and point-in-time recovery
- Managed patching and maintenance
- Better scalability with auto-scaling support
- Enhanced security with encryption at rest/transit
- Reduced operational complexity

## [2.0.0-develop.1](https://github.com/Setup-Automatizado/zedaapi/compare/v1.2.0-develop.3...v2.0.0-develop.1) (2026-01-14)

### ‚ö† BREAKING CHANGES

* **events:** Events with waitingMessage=true and receipts from
secondary devices are now filtered by default. Set the corresponding
environment variables to false to restore previous behavior.
* **terraform:** Replace containerized data stores with AWS managed
services (RDS PostgreSQL, ElastiCache Redis, S3) for improved
reliability, scalability, and operational efficiency.

New Terraform Modules:
- RDS PostgreSQL with Multi-AZ, automated backups, encryption
- ElastiCache Redis with replication and automatic failover
- S3 buckets with versioning, encryption, lifecycle policies

Module Refactoring:
- ECS Service: Simplified to API-only container, removed Postgres/Redis/MinIO
- Security Groups: Added RDS and ElastiCache SGs, removed EFS
- Secrets Manager: Flexible payload structure per environment

Environment Migration:
Production:
- RDS db.r6g.large Multi-AZ, 100GB gp3, 7-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.r6g.large with 2 replicas
- S3 whatsmeow-production-media
- Cost: ~$575/month

Staging:
- RDS db.t4g.medium single-AZ, 20GB, 3-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small with 1 replica
- FARGATE_SPOT enabled
- Cost: ~$126/month

Homolog:
- RDS db.t4g.small single-AZ, 10GB, 1-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small no replicas
- FARGATE_SPOT, NAT Gateway disabled
- Cost: ~$84/month

Documentation:
- Updated architecture diagram with managed services
- New cost breakdown per environment
- Updated troubleshooting for RDS/ElastiCache/S3
- Removed EFS and container-based service documentation

Benefits:
- Automated backups and point-in-time recovery
- Managed patching and maintenance
- Better scalability with auto-scaling support
- Enhanced security with encryption at rest/transit
- Reduced operational complexity

## [2.0.0-develop.1](https://github.com/Setup-Automatizado/zedaapi/compare/v1.2.0-develop.3...v2.0.0-develop.1) (2026-01-14)

### ‚ö† BREAKING CHANGES

* **events:** Events with waitingMessage=true and receipts from
secondary devices are now filtered by default. Set the corresponding
environment variables to false to restore previous behavior.
* **terraform:** Replace containerized data stores with AWS managed
services (RDS PostgreSQL, ElastiCache Redis, S3) for improved
reliability, scalability, and operational efficiency.

New Terraform Modules:
- RDS PostgreSQL with Multi-AZ, automated backups, encryption
- ElastiCache Redis with replication and automatic failover
- S3 buckets with versioning, encryption, lifecycle policies

Module Refactoring:
- ECS Service: Simplified to API-only container, removed Postgres/Redis/MinIO
- Security Groups: Added RDS and ElastiCache SGs, removed EFS
- Secrets Manager: Flexible payload structure per environment

Environment Migration:
Production:
- RDS db.r6g.large Multi-AZ, 100GB gp3, 7-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.r6g.large with 2 replicas
- S3 whatsmeow-production-media
- Cost: ~$575/month

Staging:
- RDS db.t4g.medium single-AZ, 20GB, 3-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small with 1 replica
- FARGATE_SPOT enabled
- Cost: ~$126/month

Homolog:
- RDS db.t4g.small single-AZ, 10GB, 1-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small no replicas
- FARGATE_SPOT, NAT Gateway disabled
- Cost: ~$84/month

Documentation:
- Updated architecture diagram with managed services
- New cost breakdown per environment
- Updated troubleshooting for RDS/ElastiCache/S3
- Removed EFS and container-based service documentation

Benefits:
- Automated backups and point-in-time recovery
- Managed patching and maintenance
- Better scalability with auto-scaling support
- Enhanced security with encryption at rest/transit
- Reduced operational complexity

## [2.0.0-develop.1](https://github.com/Setup-Automatizado/zedaapi/compare/v1.2.0-develop.3...v2.0.0-develop.1) (2026-01-14)

### ‚ö† BREAKING CHANGES

* **events:** Events with waitingMessage=true and receipts from
secondary devices are now filtered by default. Set the corresponding
environment variables to false to restore previous behavior.
* **terraform:** Replace containerized data stores with AWS managed
services (RDS PostgreSQL, ElastiCache Redis, S3) for improved
reliability, scalability, and operational efficiency.

New Terraform Modules:
- RDS PostgreSQL with Multi-AZ, automated backups, encryption
- ElastiCache Redis with replication and automatic failover
- S3 buckets with versioning, encryption, lifecycle policies

Module Refactoring:
- ECS Service: Simplified to API-only container, removed Postgres/Redis/MinIO
- Security Groups: Added RDS and ElastiCache SGs, removed EFS
- Secrets Manager: Flexible payload structure per environment

Environment Migration:
Production:
- RDS db.r6g.large Multi-AZ, 100GB gp3, 7-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.r6g.large with 2 replicas
- S3 whatsmeow-production-media
- Cost: ~$575/month

Staging:
- RDS db.t4g.medium single-AZ, 20GB, 3-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small with 1 replica
- FARGATE_SPOT enabled
- Cost: ~$126/month

Homolog:
- RDS db.t4g.small single-AZ, 10GB, 1-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small no replicas
- FARGATE_SPOT, NAT Gateway disabled
- Cost: ~$84/month

Documentation:
- Updated architecture diagram with managed services
- New cost breakdown per environment
- Updated troubleshooting for RDS/ElastiCache/S3
- Removed EFS and container-based service documentation

Benefits:
- Automated backups and point-in-time recovery
- Managed patching and maintenance
- Better scalability with auto-scaling support
- Enhanced security with encryption at rest/transit
- Reduced operational complexity

## [2.0.0-develop.1](https://github.com/Setup-Automatizado/zedaapi/compare/v1.2.0-develop.3...v2.0.0-develop.1) (2026-01-14)

### ‚ö† BREAKING CHANGES

* **events:** Events with waitingMessage=true and receipts from
secondary devices are now filtered by default. Set the corresponding
environment variables to false to restore previous behavior.
* **terraform:** Replace containerized data stores with AWS managed
services (RDS PostgreSQL, ElastiCache Redis, S3) for improved
reliability, scalability, and operational efficiency.

New Terraform Modules:
- RDS PostgreSQL with Multi-AZ, automated backups, encryption
- ElastiCache Redis with replication and automatic failover
- S3 buckets with versioning, encryption, lifecycle policies

Module Refactoring:
- ECS Service: Simplified to API-only container, removed Postgres/Redis/MinIO
- Security Groups: Added RDS and ElastiCache SGs, removed EFS
- Secrets Manager: Flexible payload structure per environment

Environment Migration:
Production:
- RDS db.r6g.large Multi-AZ, 100GB gp3, 7-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.r6g.large with 2 replicas
- S3 whatsmeow-production-media
- Cost: ~$575/month

Staging:
- RDS db.t4g.medium single-AZ, 20GB, 3-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small with 1 replica
- FARGATE_SPOT enabled
- Cost: ~$126/month

Homolog:
- RDS db.t4g.small single-AZ, 10GB, 1-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small no replicas
- FARGATE_SPOT, NAT Gateway disabled
- Cost: ~$84/month

Documentation:
- Updated architecture diagram with managed services
- New cost breakdown per environment
- Updated troubleshooting for RDS/ElastiCache/S3
- Removed EFS and container-based service documentation

Benefits:
- Automated backups and point-in-time recovery
- Managed patching and maintenance
- Better scalability with auto-scaling support
- Enhanced security with encryption at rest/transit
- Reduced operational complexity

## [2.0.0-develop.1](https://github.com/Setup-Automatizado/zedaapi/compare/v1.2.0-develop.3...v2.0.0-develop.1) (2026-01-14)

### ‚ö† BREAKING CHANGES

* **events:** Events with waitingMessage=true and receipts from
secondary devices are now filtered by default. Set the corresponding
environment variables to false to restore previous behavior.
* **terraform:** Replace containerized data stores with AWS managed
services (RDS PostgreSQL, ElastiCache Redis, S3) for improved
reliability, scalability, and operational efficiency.

New Terraform Modules:
- RDS PostgreSQL with Multi-AZ, automated backups, encryption
- ElastiCache Redis with replication and automatic failover
- S3 buckets with versioning, encryption, lifecycle policies

Module Refactoring:
- ECS Service: Simplified to API-only container, removed Postgres/Redis/MinIO
- Security Groups: Added RDS and ElastiCache SGs, removed EFS
- Secrets Manager: Flexible payload structure per environment

Environment Migration:
Production:
- RDS db.r6g.large Multi-AZ, 100GB gp3, 7-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.r6g.large with 2 replicas
- S3 whatsmeow-production-media
- Cost: ~$575/month

Staging:
- RDS db.t4g.medium single-AZ, 20GB, 3-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small with 1 replica
- FARGATE_SPOT enabled
- Cost: ~$126/month

Homolog:
- RDS db.t4g.small single-AZ, 10GB, 1-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small no replicas
- FARGATE_SPOT, NAT Gateway disabled
- Cost: ~$84/month

Documentation:
- Updated architecture diagram with managed services
- New cost breakdown per environment
- Updated troubleshooting for RDS/ElastiCache/S3
- Removed EFS and container-based service documentation

Benefits:
- Automated backups and point-in-time recovery
- Managed patching and maintenance
- Better scalability with auto-scaling support
- Enhanced security with encryption at rest/transit
- Reduced operational complexity

## [2.0.0-develop.1](https://github.com/Setup-Automatizado/zedaapi/compare/v1.2.0-develop.3...v2.0.0-develop.1) (2026-01-14)

### ‚ö† BREAKING CHANGES

* **events:** Events with waitingMessage=true and receipts from
secondary devices are now filtered by default. Set the corresponding
environment variables to false to restore previous behavior.
* **terraform:** Replace containerized data stores with AWS managed
services (RDS PostgreSQL, ElastiCache Redis, S3) for improved
reliability, scalability, and operational efficiency.

New Terraform Modules:
- RDS PostgreSQL with Multi-AZ, automated backups, encryption
- ElastiCache Redis with replication and automatic failover
- S3 buckets with versioning, encryption, lifecycle policies

Module Refactoring:
- ECS Service: Simplified to API-only container, removed Postgres/Redis/MinIO
- Security Groups: Added RDS and ElastiCache SGs, removed EFS
- Secrets Manager: Flexible payload structure per environment

Environment Migration:
Production:
- RDS db.r6g.large Multi-AZ, 100GB gp3, 7-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.r6g.large with 2 replicas
- S3 whatsmeow-production-media
- Cost: ~$575/month

Staging:
- RDS db.t4g.medium single-AZ, 20GB, 3-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small with 1 replica
- FARGATE_SPOT enabled
- Cost: ~$126/month

Homolog:
- RDS db.t4g.small single-AZ, 10GB, 1-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small no replicas
- FARGATE_SPOT, NAT Gateway disabled
- Cost: ~$84/month

Documentation:
- Updated architecture diagram with managed services
- New cost breakdown per environment
- Updated troubleshooting for RDS/ElastiCache/S3
- Removed EFS and container-based service documentation

Benefits:
- Automated backups and point-in-time recovery
- Managed patching and maintenance
- Better scalability with auto-scaling support
- Enhanced security with encryption at rest/transit
- Reduced operational complexity

## [2.0.0-develop.1](https://github.com/Setup-Automatizado/zedaapi/compare/v1.2.0-develop.3...v2.0.0-develop.1) (2026-01-14)

### ‚ö† BREAKING CHANGES

* **events:** Events with waitingMessage=true and receipts from
secondary devices are now filtered by default. Set the corresponding
environment variables to false to restore previous behavior.
* **terraform:** Replace containerized data stores with AWS managed
services (RDS PostgreSQL, ElastiCache Redis, S3) for improved
reliability, scalability, and operational efficiency.

New Terraform Modules:
- RDS PostgreSQL with Multi-AZ, automated backups, encryption
- ElastiCache Redis with replication and automatic failover
- S3 buckets with versioning, encryption, lifecycle policies

Module Refactoring:
- ECS Service: Simplified to API-only container, removed Postgres/Redis/MinIO
- Security Groups: Added RDS and ElastiCache SGs, removed EFS
- Secrets Manager: Flexible payload structure per environment

Environment Migration:
Production:
- RDS db.r6g.large Multi-AZ, 100GB gp3, 7-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.r6g.large with 2 replicas
- S3 whatsmeow-production-media
- Cost: ~$575/month

Staging:
- RDS db.t4g.medium single-AZ, 20GB, 3-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small with 1 replica
- FARGATE_SPOT enabled
- Cost: ~$126/month

Homolog:
- RDS db.t4g.small single-AZ, 10GB, 1-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small no replicas
- FARGATE_SPOT, NAT Gateway disabled
- Cost: ~$84/month

Documentation:
- Updated architecture diagram with managed services
- New cost breakdown per environment
- Updated troubleshooting for RDS/ElastiCache/S3
- Removed EFS and container-based service documentation

Benefits:
- Automated backups and point-in-time recovery
- Managed patching and maintenance
- Better scalability with auto-scaling support
- Enhanced security with encryption at rest/transit
- Reduced operational complexity

## [2.0.0-develop.1](https://github.com/Setup-Automatizado/zedaapi/compare/v1.2.0-develop.3...v2.0.0-develop.1) (2026-01-14)

### ‚ö† BREAKING CHANGES

* **events:** Events with waitingMessage=true and receipts from
secondary devices are now filtered by default. Set the corresponding
environment variables to false to restore previous behavior.
* **terraform:** Replace containerized data stores with AWS managed
services (RDS PostgreSQL, ElastiCache Redis, S3) for improved
reliability, scalability, and operational efficiency.

New Terraform Modules:
- RDS PostgreSQL with Multi-AZ, automated backups, encryption
- ElastiCache Redis with replication and automatic failover
- S3 buckets with versioning, encryption, lifecycle policies

Module Refactoring:
- ECS Service: Simplified to API-only container, removed Postgres/Redis/MinIO
- Security Groups: Added RDS and ElastiCache SGs, removed EFS
- Secrets Manager: Flexible payload structure per environment

Environment Migration:
Production:
- RDS db.r6g.large Multi-AZ, 100GB gp3, 7-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.r6g.large with 2 replicas
- S3 whatsmeow-production-media
- Cost: ~$575/month

Staging:
- RDS db.t4g.medium single-AZ, 20GB, 3-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small with 1 replica
- FARGATE_SPOT enabled
- Cost: ~$126/month

Homolog:
- RDS db.t4g.small single-AZ, 10GB, 1-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small no replicas
- FARGATE_SPOT, NAT Gateway disabled
- Cost: ~$84/month

Documentation:
- Updated architecture diagram with managed services
- New cost breakdown per environment
- Updated troubleshooting for RDS/ElastiCache/S3
- Removed EFS and container-based service documentation

Benefits:
- Automated backups and point-in-time recovery
- Managed patching and maintenance
- Better scalability with auto-scaling support
- Enhanced security with encryption at rest/transit
- Reduced operational complexity

### ‚ö† BREAKING CHANGES

* **events:** Events with waitingMessage=true and receipts from
secondary devices are now filtered by default. Set the corresponding
environment variables to false to restore previous behavior.
* **terraform:** Replace containerized data stores with AWS managed
services (RDS PostgreSQL, ElastiCache Redis, S3) for improved
reliability, scalability, and operational efficiency.

New Terraform Modules:
- RDS PostgreSQL with Multi-AZ, automated backups, encryption
- ElastiCache Redis with replication and automatic failover
- S3 buckets with versioning, encryption, lifecycle policies

Module Refactoring:
- ECS Service: Simplified to API-only container, removed Postgres/Redis/MinIO
- Security Groups: Added RDS and ElastiCache SGs, removed EFS
- Secrets Manager: Flexible payload structure per environment

Environment Migration:
Production:
- RDS db.r6g.large Multi-AZ, 100GB gp3, 7-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.r6g.large with 2 replicas
- S3 whatsmeow-production-media
- Cost: ~$575/month

Staging:
- RDS db.t4g.medium single-AZ, 20GB, 3-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small with 1 replica
- FARGATE_SPOT enabled
- Cost: ~$126/month

Homolog:
- RDS db.t4g.small single-AZ, 10GB, 1-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small no replicas
- FARGATE_SPOT, NAT Gateway disabled
- Cost: ~$84/month

Documentation:
- Updated architecture diagram with managed services
- New cost breakdown per environment
- Updated troubleshooting for RDS/ElastiCache/S3
- Removed EFS and container-based service documentation

Benefits:
- Automated backups and point-in-time recovery
- Managed patching and maintenance
- Better scalability with auto-scaling support
- Enhanced security with encryption at rest/transit
- Reduced operational complexity

## [2.0.0-develop.1](https://github.com/Setup-Automatizado/zedaapi/compare/v1.2.0-develop.3...v2.0.0-develop.1) (2026-01-14)

### ‚ö† BREAKING CHANGES

* **events:** Events with waitingMessage=true and receipts from
secondary devices are now filtered by default. Set the corresponding
environment variables to false to restore previous behavior.
* **terraform:** Replace containerized data stores with AWS managed
services (RDS PostgreSQL, ElastiCache Redis, S3) for improved
reliability, scalability, and operational efficiency.

New Terraform Modules:
- RDS PostgreSQL with Multi-AZ, automated backups, encryption
- ElastiCache Redis with replication and automatic failover
- S3 buckets with versioning, encryption, lifecycle policies

Module Refactoring:
- ECS Service: Simplified to API-only container, removed Postgres/Redis/MinIO
- Security Groups: Added RDS and ElastiCache SGs, removed EFS
- Secrets Manager: Flexible payload structure per environment

Environment Migration:
Production:
- RDS db.r6g.large Multi-AZ, 100GB gp3, 7-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.r6g.large with 2 replicas
- S3 whatsmeow-production-media
- Cost: ~$575/month

Staging:
- RDS db.t4g.medium single-AZ, 20GB, 3-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small with 1 replica
- FARGATE_SPOT enabled
- Cost: ~$126/month

Homolog:
- RDS db.t4g.small single-AZ, 10GB, 1-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small no replicas
- FARGATE_SPOT, NAT Gateway disabled
- Cost: ~$84/month

Documentation:
- Updated architecture diagram with managed services
- New cost breakdown per environment
- Updated troubleshooting for RDS/ElastiCache/S3
- Removed EFS and container-based service documentation

Benefits:
- Automated backups and point-in-time recovery
- Managed patching and maintenance
- Better scalability with auto-scaling support
- Enhanced security with encryption at rest/transit
- Reduced operational complexity

## [2.0.0-develop.1](https://github.com/Setup-Automatizado/zedaapi/compare/v1.2.0-develop.3...v2.0.0-develop.1) (2026-01-14)

### ‚ö† BREAKING CHANGES

* **terraform:** Replace containerized data stores with AWS managed
services (RDS PostgreSQL, ElastiCache Redis, S3) for improved
reliability, scalability, and operational efficiency.

New Terraform Modules:
- RDS PostgreSQL with Multi-AZ, automated backups, encryption
- ElastiCache Redis with replication and automatic failover
- S3 buckets with versioning, encryption, lifecycle policies

Module Refactoring:
- ECS Service: Simplified to API-only container, removed Postgres/Redis/MinIO
- Security Groups: Added RDS and ElastiCache SGs, removed EFS
- Secrets Manager: Flexible payload structure per environment

Environment Migration:
Production:
- RDS db.r6g.large Multi-AZ, 100GB gp3, 7-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.r6g.large with 2 replicas
- S3 whatsmeow-production-media
- Cost: ~$575/month

Staging:
- RDS db.t4g.medium single-AZ, 20GB, 3-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small with 1 replica
- FARGATE_SPOT enabled
- Cost: ~$126/month

Homolog:
- RDS db.t4g.small single-AZ, 10GB, 1-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small no replicas
- FARGATE_SPOT, NAT Gateway disabled
- Cost: ~$84/month

Documentation:
- Updated architecture diagram with managed services
- New cost breakdown per environment
- Updated troubleshooting for RDS/ElastiCache/S3
- Removed EFS and container-based service documentation

- Automated backups and point-in-time recovery
- Managed patching and maintenance
- Better scalability with auto-scaling support
- Enhanced security with encryption at rest/transit
- Reduced operational complexity

## [2.0.0-develop.1](https://github.com/Setup-Automatizado/zedaapi/compare/v1.2.0-develop.3...v2.0.0-develop.1) (2026-01-13)

### ‚ö† BREAKING CHANGES

* **terraform:** Replace containerized data stores with AWS managed
services (RDS PostgreSQL, ElastiCache Redis, S3) for improved
reliability, scalability, and operational efficiency.

New Terraform Modules:
- RDS PostgreSQL with Multi-AZ, automated backups, encryption
- ElastiCache Redis with replication and automatic failover
- S3 buckets with versioning, encryption, lifecycle policies

Module Refactoring:
- ECS Service: Simplified to API-only container, removed Postgres/Redis/MinIO
- Security Groups: Added RDS and ElastiCache SGs, removed EFS
- Secrets Manager: Flexible payload structure per environment

Environment Migration:
Production:
- RDS db.r6g.large Multi-AZ, 100GB gp3, 7-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.r6g.large with 2 replicas
- S3 whatsmeow-production-media
- Cost: ~$575/month

Staging:
- RDS db.t4g.medium single-AZ, 20GB, 3-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small with 1 replica
- FARGATE_SPOT enabled
- Cost: ~$126/month

Homolog:
- RDS db.t4g.small single-AZ, 10GB, 1-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small no replicas
- FARGATE_SPOT, NAT Gateway disabled
- Cost: ~$84/month

Documentation:
- Updated architecture diagram with managed services
- New cost breakdown per environment
- Updated troubleshooting for RDS/ElastiCache/S3
- Removed EFS and container-based service documentation

Benefits:
- Automated backups and point-in-time recovery
- Managed patching and maintenance
- Better scalability with auto-scaling support
- Enhanced security with encryption at rest/transit
- Reduced operational complexity

## [2.0.0-develop.1](https://github.com/Setup-Automatizado/zedaapi/compare/v1.2.0-develop.3...v2.0.0-develop.1) (2026-01-10)

### ‚ö† BREAKING CHANGES

* **terraform:** Replace containerized data stores with AWS managed
services (RDS PostgreSQL, ElastiCache Redis, S3) for improved
reliability, scalability, and operational efficiency.

New Terraform Modules:
- RDS PostgreSQL with Multi-AZ, automated backups, encryption
- ElastiCache Redis with replication and automatic failover
- S3 buckets with versioning, encryption, lifecycle policies

Module Refactoring:
- ECS Service: Simplified to API-only container, removed Postgres/Redis/MinIO
- Security Groups: Added RDS and ElastiCache SGs, removed EFS
- Secrets Manager: Flexible payload structure per environment

Environment Migration:
Production:
- RDS db.r6g.large Multi-AZ, 100GB gp3, 7-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.r6g.large with 2 replicas
- S3 whatsmeow-production-media
- Cost: ~$575/month

Staging:
- RDS db.t4g.medium single-AZ, 20GB, 3-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small with 1 replica
- FARGATE_SPOT enabled
- Cost: ~$126/month

Homolog:
- RDS db.t4g.small single-AZ, 10GB, 1-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small no replicas
- FARGATE_SPOT, NAT Gateway disabled
- Cost: ~$84/month

Documentation:
- Updated architecture diagram with managed services
- New cost breakdown per environment
- Updated troubleshooting for RDS/ElastiCache/S3
- Removed EFS and container-based service documentation

Benefits:
- Automated backups and point-in-time recovery
- Managed patching and maintenance
- Better scalability with auto-scaling support
- Enhanced security with encryption at rest/transit
- Reduced operational complexity

## [2.0.0-develop.1](https://github.com/Setup-Automatizado/zedaapi/compare/v1.2.0-develop.3...v2.0.0-develop.1) (2026-01-09)

### ‚ö† BREAKING CHANGES

* **terraform:** Replace containerized data stores with AWS managed
services (RDS PostgreSQL, ElastiCache Redis, S3) for improved
reliability, scalability, and operational efficiency.

New Terraform Modules:
- RDS PostgreSQL with Multi-AZ, automated backups, encryption
- ElastiCache Redis with replication and automatic failover
- S3 buckets with versioning, encryption, lifecycle policies

Module Refactoring:
- ECS Service: Simplified to API-only container, removed Postgres/Redis/MinIO
- Security Groups: Added RDS and ElastiCache SGs, removed EFS
- Secrets Manager: Flexible payload structure per environment

Environment Migration:
Production:
- RDS db.r6g.large Multi-AZ, 100GB gp3, 7-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.r6g.large with 2 replicas
- S3 whatsmeow-production-media
- Cost: ~$575/month

Staging:
- RDS db.t4g.medium single-AZ, 20GB, 3-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small with 1 replica
- FARGATE_SPOT enabled
- Cost: ~$126/month

Homolog:
- RDS db.t4g.small single-AZ, 10GB, 1-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small no replicas
- FARGATE_SPOT, NAT Gateway disabled
- Cost: ~$84/month

Documentation:
- Updated architecture diagram with managed services
- New cost breakdown per environment
- Updated troubleshooting for RDS/ElastiCache/S3
- Removed EFS and container-based service documentation

Benefits:
- Automated backups and point-in-time recovery
- Managed patching and maintenance
- Better scalability with auto-scaling support
- Enhanced security with encryption at rest/transit
- Reduced operational complexity

## [2.0.0-develop.1](https://github.com/Setup-Automatizado/zedaapi/compare/v1.2.0-develop.3...v2.0.0-develop.1) (2026-01-09)

### ‚ö† BREAKING CHANGES

* **terraform:** Replace containerized data stores with AWS managed
services (RDS PostgreSQL, ElastiCache Redis, S3) for improved
reliability, scalability, and operational efficiency.

New Terraform Modules:
- RDS PostgreSQL with Multi-AZ, automated backups, encryption
- ElastiCache Redis with replication and automatic failover
- S3 buckets with versioning, encryption, lifecycle policies

Module Refactoring:
- ECS Service: Simplified to API-only container, removed Postgres/Redis/MinIO
- Security Groups: Added RDS and ElastiCache SGs, removed EFS
- Secrets Manager: Flexible payload structure per environment

Environment Migration:
Production:
- RDS db.r6g.large Multi-AZ, 100GB gp3, 7-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.r6g.large with 2 replicas
- S3 whatsmeow-production-media
- Cost: ~$575/month

Staging:
- RDS db.t4g.medium single-AZ, 20GB, 3-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small with 1 replica
- FARGATE_SPOT enabled
- Cost: ~$126/month

Homolog:
- RDS db.t4g.small single-AZ, 10GB, 1-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small no replicas
- FARGATE_SPOT, NAT Gateway disabled
- Cost: ~$84/month

Documentation:
- Updated architecture diagram with managed services
- New cost breakdown per environment
- Updated troubleshooting for RDS/ElastiCache/S3
- Removed EFS and container-based service documentation

Benefits:
- Automated backups and point-in-time recovery
- Managed patching and maintenance
- Better scalability with auto-scaling support
- Enhanced security with encryption at rest/transit
- Reduced operational complexity

## [2.0.0-develop.1](https://github.com/Setup-Automatizado/zedaapi/compare/v1.2.0-develop.3...v2.0.0-develop.1) (2026-01-09)

### ‚ö† BREAKING CHANGES

* **terraform:** Replace containerized data stores with AWS managed
services (RDS PostgreSQL, ElastiCache Redis, S3) for improved
reliability, scalability, and operational efficiency.

New Terraform Modules:
- RDS PostgreSQL with Multi-AZ, automated backups, encryption
- ElastiCache Redis with replication and automatic failover
- S3 buckets with versioning, encryption, lifecycle policies

Module Refactoring:
- ECS Service: Simplified to API-only container, removed Postgres/Redis/MinIO
- Security Groups: Added RDS and ElastiCache SGs, removed EFS
- Secrets Manager: Flexible payload structure per environment

Environment Migration:
Production:
- RDS db.r6g.large Multi-AZ, 100GB gp3, 7-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.r6g.large with 2 replicas
- S3 whatsmeow-production-media
- Cost: ~$575/month

Staging:
- RDS db.t4g.medium single-AZ, 20GB, 3-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small with 1 replica
- FARGATE_SPOT enabled
- Cost: ~$126/month

Homolog:
- RDS db.t4g.small single-AZ, 10GB, 1-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small no replicas
- FARGATE_SPOT, NAT Gateway disabled
- Cost: ~$84/month

Documentation:
- Updated architecture diagram with managed services
- New cost breakdown per environment
- Updated troubleshooting for RDS/ElastiCache/S3
- Removed EFS and container-based service documentation

Benefits:
- Automated backups and point-in-time recovery
- Managed patching and maintenance
- Better scalability with auto-scaling support
- Enhanced security with encryption at rest/transit
- Reduced operational complexity

## [2.0.0-develop.1](https://github.com/Setup-Automatizado/zedaapi/compare/v1.2.0-develop.3...v2.0.0-develop.1) (2026-01-09)

### ‚ö† BREAKING CHANGES

* **terraform:** Replace containerized data stores with AWS managed
services (RDS PostgreSQL, ElastiCache Redis, S3) for improved
reliability, scalability, and operational efficiency.

New Terraform Modules:
- RDS PostgreSQL with Multi-AZ, automated backups, encryption
- ElastiCache Redis with replication and automatic failover
- S3 buckets with versioning, encryption, lifecycle policies

Module Refactoring:
- ECS Service: Simplified to API-only container, removed Postgres/Redis/MinIO
- Security Groups: Added RDS and ElastiCache SGs, removed EFS
- Secrets Manager: Flexible payload structure per environment

Environment Migration:
Production:
- RDS db.r6g.large Multi-AZ, 100GB gp3, 7-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.r6g.large with 2 replicas
- S3 whatsmeow-production-media
- Cost: ~$575/month

Staging:
- RDS db.t4g.medium single-AZ, 20GB, 3-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small with 1 replica
- FARGATE_SPOT enabled
- Cost: ~$126/month

Homolog:
- RDS db.t4g.small single-AZ, 10GB, 1-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small no replicas
- FARGATE_SPOT, NAT Gateway disabled
- Cost: ~$84/month

Documentation:
- Updated architecture diagram with managed services
- New cost breakdown per environment
- Updated troubleshooting for RDS/ElastiCache/S3
- Removed EFS and container-based service documentation

Benefits:
- Automated backups and point-in-time recovery
- Managed patching and maintenance
- Better scalability with auto-scaling support
- Enhanced security with encryption at rest/transit
- Reduced operational complexity

## [2.0.0-develop.1](https://github.com/Setup-Automatizado/zedaapi/compare/v1.2.0-develop.3...v2.0.0-develop.1) (2026-01-09)

### ‚ö† BREAKING CHANGES

* **terraform:** Replace containerized data stores with AWS managed
services (RDS PostgreSQL, ElastiCache Redis, S3) for improved
reliability, scalability, and operational efficiency.

New Terraform Modules:
- RDS PostgreSQL with Multi-AZ, automated backups, encryption
- ElastiCache Redis with replication and automatic failover
- S3 buckets with versioning, encryption, lifecycle policies

Module Refactoring:
- ECS Service: Simplified to API-only container, removed Postgres/Redis/MinIO
- Security Groups: Added RDS and ElastiCache SGs, removed EFS
- Secrets Manager: Flexible payload structure per environment

Environment Migration:
Production:
- RDS db.r6g.large Multi-AZ, 100GB gp3, 7-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.r6g.large with 2 replicas
- S3 whatsmeow-production-media
- Cost: ~$575/month

Staging:
- RDS db.t4g.medium single-AZ, 20GB, 3-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small with 1 replica
- FARGATE_SPOT enabled
- Cost: ~$126/month

Homolog:
- RDS db.t4g.small single-AZ, 10GB, 1-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small no replicas
- FARGATE_SPOT, NAT Gateway disabled
- Cost: ~$84/month

Documentation:
- Updated architecture diagram with managed services
- New cost breakdown per environment
- Updated troubleshooting for RDS/ElastiCache/S3
- Removed EFS and container-based service documentation

Benefits:
- Automated backups and point-in-time recovery
- Managed patching and maintenance
- Better scalability with auto-scaling support
- Enhanced security with encryption at rest/transit
- Reduced operational complexity

## [2.0.0-develop.1](https://github.com/Setup-Automatizado/zedaapi/compare/v1.2.0-develop.3...v2.0.0-develop.1) (2026-01-09)

### ‚ö† BREAKING CHANGES

* **terraform:** Replace containerized data stores with AWS managed
services (RDS PostgreSQL, ElastiCache Redis, S3) for improved
reliability, scalability, and operational efficiency.

New Terraform Modules:
- RDS PostgreSQL with Multi-AZ, automated backups, encryption
- ElastiCache Redis with replication and automatic failover
- S3 buckets with versioning, encryption, lifecycle policies

Module Refactoring:
- ECS Service: Simplified to API-only container, removed Postgres/Redis/MinIO
- Security Groups: Added RDS and ElastiCache SGs, removed EFS
- Secrets Manager: Flexible payload structure per environment

Environment Migration:
Production:
- RDS db.r6g.large Multi-AZ, 100GB gp3, 7-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.r6g.large with 2 replicas
- S3 whatsmeow-production-media
- Cost: ~$575/month

Staging:
- RDS db.t4g.medium single-AZ, 20GB, 3-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small with 1 replica
- FARGATE_SPOT enabled
- Cost: ~$126/month

Homolog:
- RDS db.t4g.small single-AZ, 10GB, 1-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small no replicas
- FARGATE_SPOT, NAT Gateway disabled
- Cost: ~$84/month

Documentation:
- Updated architecture diagram with managed services
- New cost breakdown per environment
- Updated troubleshooting for RDS/ElastiCache/S3
- Removed EFS and container-based service documentation

Benefits:
- Automated backups and point-in-time recovery
- Managed patching and maintenance
- Better scalability with auto-scaling support
- Enhanced security with encryption at rest/transit
- Reduced operational complexity

## [2.0.0-develop.1](https://github.com/Setup-Automatizado/zedaapi/compare/v1.2.0-develop.3...v2.0.0-develop.1) (2026-01-09)

### ‚ö† BREAKING CHANGES

* **terraform:** Replace containerized data stores with AWS managed
services (RDS PostgreSQL, ElastiCache Redis, S3) for improved
reliability, scalability, and operational efficiency.

New Terraform Modules:
- RDS PostgreSQL with Multi-AZ, automated backups, encryption
- ElastiCache Redis with replication and automatic failover
- S3 buckets with versioning, encryption, lifecycle policies

Module Refactoring:
- ECS Service: Simplified to API-only container, removed Postgres/Redis/MinIO
- Security Groups: Added RDS and ElastiCache SGs, removed EFS
- Secrets Manager: Flexible payload structure per environment

Environment Migration:
Production:
- RDS db.r6g.large Multi-AZ, 100GB gp3, 7-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.r6g.large with 2 replicas
- S3 whatsmeow-production-media
- Cost: ~$575/month

Staging:
- RDS db.t4g.medium single-AZ, 20GB, 3-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small with 1 replica
- FARGATE_SPOT enabled
- Cost: ~$126/month

Homolog:
- RDS db.t4g.small single-AZ, 10GB, 1-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small no replicas
- FARGATE_SPOT, NAT Gateway disabled
- Cost: ~$84/month

Documentation:
- Updated architecture diagram with managed services
- New cost breakdown per environment
- Updated troubleshooting for RDS/ElastiCache/S3
- Removed EFS and container-based service documentation

Benefits:
- Automated backups and point-in-time recovery
- Managed patching and maintenance
- Better scalability with auto-scaling support
- Enhanced security with encryption at rest/transit
- Reduced operational complexity

## [2.0.0-develop.1](https://github.com/Setup-Automatizado/zedaapi/compare/v1.2.0-develop.3...v2.0.0-develop.1) (2026-01-09)

### ‚ö† BREAKING CHANGES

* **terraform:** Replace containerized data stores with AWS managed
services (RDS PostgreSQL, ElastiCache Redis, S3) for improved
reliability, scalability, and operational efficiency.

New Terraform Modules:
- RDS PostgreSQL with Multi-AZ, automated backups, encryption
- ElastiCache Redis with replication and automatic failover
- S3 buckets with versioning, encryption, lifecycle policies

Module Refactoring:
- ECS Service: Simplified to API-only container, removed Postgres/Redis/MinIO
- Security Groups: Added RDS and ElastiCache SGs, removed EFS
- Secrets Manager: Flexible payload structure per environment

Environment Migration:
Production:
- RDS db.r6g.large Multi-AZ, 100GB gp3, 7-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.r6g.large with 2 replicas
- S3 whatsmeow-production-media
- Cost: ~$575/month

Staging:
- RDS db.t4g.medium single-AZ, 20GB, 3-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small with 1 replica
- FARGATE_SPOT enabled
- Cost: ~$126/month

Homolog:
- RDS db.t4g.small single-AZ, 10GB, 1-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small no replicas
- FARGATE_SPOT, NAT Gateway disabled
- Cost: ~$84/month

Documentation:
- Updated architecture diagram with managed services
- New cost breakdown per environment
- Updated troubleshooting for RDS/ElastiCache/S3
- Removed EFS and container-based service documentation

Benefits:
- Automated backups and point-in-time recovery
- Managed patching and maintenance
- Better scalability with auto-scaling support
- Enhanced security with encryption at rest/transit
- Reduced operational complexity

## [2.0.0-develop.1](https://github.com/Setup-Automatizado/zedaapi/compare/v1.2.0-develop.3...v2.0.0-develop.1) (2025-12-30)

### ‚ö† BREAKING CHANGES

* **terraform:** Replace containerized data stores with AWS managed
services (RDS PostgreSQL, ElastiCache Redis, S3) for improved
reliability, scalability, and operational efficiency.

New Terraform Modules:
- RDS PostgreSQL with Multi-AZ, automated backups, encryption
- ElastiCache Redis with replication and automatic failover
- S3 buckets with versioning, encryption, lifecycle policies

Module Refactoring:
- ECS Service: Simplified to API-only container, removed Postgres/Redis/MinIO
- Security Groups: Added RDS and ElastiCache SGs, removed EFS
- Secrets Manager: Flexible payload structure per environment

Environment Migration:
Production:
- RDS db.r6g.large Multi-AZ, 100GB gp3, 7-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.r6g.large with 2 replicas
- S3 whatsmeow-production-media
- Cost: ~$575/month

Staging:
- RDS db.t4g.medium single-AZ, 20GB, 3-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small with 1 replica
- FARGATE_SPOT enabled
- Cost: ~$126/month

Homolog:
- RDS db.t4g.small single-AZ, 10GB, 1-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small no replicas
- FARGATE_SPOT, NAT Gateway disabled
- Cost: ~$84/month

Documentation:
- Updated architecture diagram with managed services
- New cost breakdown per environment
- Updated troubleshooting for RDS/ElastiCache/S3
- Removed EFS and container-based service documentation

Benefits:
- Automated backups and point-in-time recovery
- Managed patching and maintenance
- Better scalability with auto-scaling support
- Enhanced security with encryption at rest/transit
- Reduced operational complexity

## [2.0.0-develop.1](https://github.com/Setup-Automatizado/zedaapi/compare/v1.2.0-develop.3...v2.0.0-develop.1) (2025-12-27)

### ‚ö† BREAKING CHANGES

* **terraform:** Replace containerized data stores with AWS managed
services (RDS PostgreSQL, ElastiCache Redis, S3) for improved
reliability, scalability, and operational efficiency.

New Terraform Modules:
- RDS PostgreSQL with Multi-AZ, automated backups, encryption
- ElastiCache Redis with replication and automatic failover
- S3 buckets with versioning, encryption, lifecycle policies

Module Refactoring:
- ECS Service: Simplified to API-only container, removed Postgres/Redis/MinIO
- Security Groups: Added RDS and ElastiCache SGs, removed EFS
- Secrets Manager: Flexible payload structure per environment

Environment Migration:
Production:
- RDS db.r6g.large Multi-AZ, 100GB gp3, 7-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.r6g.large with 2 replicas
- S3 whatsmeow-production-media
- Cost: ~$575/month

Staging:
- RDS db.t4g.medium single-AZ, 20GB, 3-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small with 1 replica
- FARGATE_SPOT enabled
- Cost: ~$126/month

Homolog:
- RDS db.t4g.small single-AZ, 10GB, 1-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small no replicas
- FARGATE_SPOT, NAT Gateway disabled
- Cost: ~$84/month

Documentation:
- Updated architecture diagram with managed services
- New cost breakdown per environment
- Updated troubleshooting for RDS/ElastiCache/S3
- Removed EFS and container-based service documentation

Benefits:
- Automated backups and point-in-time recovery
- Managed patching and maintenance
- Better scalability with auto-scaling support
- Enhanced security with encryption at rest/transit
- Reduced operational complexity

## [2.0.0-develop.1](https://github.com/Setup-Automatizado/zedaapi/compare/v1.2.0-develop.3...v2.0.0-develop.1) (2025-12-21)

### ‚ö† BREAKING CHANGES

* **terraform:** Replace containerized data stores with AWS managed
services (RDS PostgreSQL, ElastiCache Redis, S3) for improved
reliability, scalability, and operational efficiency.

New Terraform Modules:
- RDS PostgreSQL with Multi-AZ, automated backups, encryption
- ElastiCache Redis with replication and automatic failover
- S3 buckets with versioning, encryption, lifecycle policies

Module Refactoring:
- ECS Service: Simplified to API-only container, removed Postgres/Redis/MinIO
- Security Groups: Added RDS and ElastiCache SGs, removed EFS
- Secrets Manager: Flexible payload structure per environment

Environment Migration:
Production:
- RDS db.r6g.large Multi-AZ, 100GB gp3, 7-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.r6g.large with 2 replicas
- S3 whatsmeow-production-media
- Cost: ~$575/month

Staging:
- RDS db.t4g.medium single-AZ, 20GB, 3-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small with 1 replica
- FARGATE_SPOT enabled
- Cost: ~$126/month

Homolog:
- RDS db.t4g.small single-AZ, 10GB, 1-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small no replicas
- FARGATE_SPOT, NAT Gateway disabled
- Cost: ~$84/month

Documentation:
- Updated architecture diagram with managed services
- New cost breakdown per environment
- Updated troubleshooting for RDS/ElastiCache/S3
- Removed EFS and container-based service documentation

Benefits:
- Automated backups and point-in-time recovery
- Managed patching and maintenance
- Better scalability with auto-scaling support
- Enhanced security with encryption at rest/transit
- Reduced operational complexity

## [2.0.0-develop.1](https://github.com/Setup-Automatizado/zedaapi/compare/v1.2.0-develop.3...v2.0.0-develop.1) (2025-12-21)

### ‚ö† BREAKING CHANGES

* **terraform:** Replace containerized data stores with AWS managed
services (RDS PostgreSQL, ElastiCache Redis, S3) for improved
reliability, scalability, and operational efficiency.

New Terraform Modules:
- RDS PostgreSQL with Multi-AZ, automated backups, encryption
- ElastiCache Redis with replication and automatic failover
- S3 buckets with versioning, encryption, lifecycle policies

Module Refactoring:
- ECS Service: Simplified to API-only container, removed Postgres/Redis/MinIO
- Security Groups: Added RDS and ElastiCache SGs, removed EFS
- Secrets Manager: Flexible payload structure per environment

Environment Migration:
Production:
- RDS db.r6g.large Multi-AZ, 100GB gp3, 7-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.r6g.large with 2 replicas
- S3 whatsmeow-production-media
- Cost: ~$575/month

Staging:
- RDS db.t4g.medium single-AZ, 20GB, 3-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small with 1 replica
- FARGATE_SPOT enabled
- Cost: ~$126/month

Homolog:
- RDS db.t4g.small single-AZ, 10GB, 1-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small no replicas
- FARGATE_SPOT, NAT Gateway disabled
- Cost: ~$84/month

Documentation:
- Updated architecture diagram with managed services
- New cost breakdown per environment
- Updated troubleshooting for RDS/ElastiCache/S3
- Removed EFS and container-based service documentation

Benefits:
- Automated backups and point-in-time recovery
- Managed patching and maintenance
- Better scalability with auto-scaling support
- Enhanced security with encryption at rest/transit
- Reduced operational complexity

## [2.0.0-develop.1](https://github.com/Setup-Automatizado/zedaapi/compare/v1.2.0-develop.3...v2.0.0-develop.1) (2025-12-21)

### ‚ö† BREAKING CHANGES

* **terraform:** Replace containerized data stores with AWS managed
services (RDS PostgreSQL, ElastiCache Redis, S3) for improved
reliability, scalability, and operational efficiency.

New Terraform Modules:
- RDS PostgreSQL with Multi-AZ, automated backups, encryption
- ElastiCache Redis with replication and automatic failover
- S3 buckets with versioning, encryption, lifecycle policies

Module Refactoring:
- ECS Service: Simplified to API-only container, removed Postgres/Redis/MinIO
- Security Groups: Added RDS and ElastiCache SGs, removed EFS
- Secrets Manager: Flexible payload structure per environment

Environment Migration:
Production:
- RDS db.r6g.large Multi-AZ, 100GB gp3, 7-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.r6g.large with 2 replicas
- S3 whatsmeow-production-media
- Cost: ~$575/month

Staging:
- RDS db.t4g.medium single-AZ, 20GB, 3-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small with 1 replica
- FARGATE_SPOT enabled
- Cost: ~$126/month

Homolog:
- RDS db.t4g.small single-AZ, 10GB, 1-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small no replicas
- FARGATE_SPOT, NAT Gateway disabled
- Cost: ~$84/month

Documentation:
- Updated architecture diagram with managed services
- New cost breakdown per environment
- Updated troubleshooting for RDS/ElastiCache/S3
- Removed EFS and container-based service documentation

Benefits:
- Automated backups and point-in-time recovery
- Managed patching and maintenance
- Better scalability with auto-scaling support
- Enhanced security with encryption at rest/transit
- Reduced operational complexity

## [2.0.0-develop.1](https://github.com/Setup-Automatizado/zedaapi/compare/v1.2.0-develop.3...v2.0.0-develop.1) (2025-12-21)

### ‚ö† BREAKING CHANGES

* **terraform:** Replace containerized data stores with AWS managed
services (RDS PostgreSQL, ElastiCache Redis, S3) for improved
reliability, scalability, and operational efficiency.

New Terraform Modules:
- RDS PostgreSQL with Multi-AZ, automated backups, encryption
- ElastiCache Redis with replication and automatic failover
- S3 buckets with versioning, encryption, lifecycle policies

Module Refactoring:
- ECS Service: Simplified to API-only container, removed Postgres/Redis/MinIO
- Security Groups: Added RDS and ElastiCache SGs, removed EFS
- Secrets Manager: Flexible payload structure per environment

Environment Migration:
Production:
- RDS db.r6g.large Multi-AZ, 100GB gp3, 7-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.r6g.large with 2 replicas
- S3 whatsmeow-production-media
- Cost: ~$575/month

Staging:
- RDS db.t4g.medium single-AZ, 20GB, 3-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small with 1 replica
- FARGATE_SPOT enabled
- Cost: ~$126/month

Homolog:
- RDS db.t4g.small single-AZ, 10GB, 1-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small no replicas
- FARGATE_SPOT, NAT Gateway disabled
- Cost: ~$84/month

Documentation:
- Updated architecture diagram with managed services
- New cost breakdown per environment
- Updated troubleshooting for RDS/ElastiCache/S3
- Removed EFS and container-based service documentation

Benefits:
- Automated backups and point-in-time recovery
- Managed patching and maintenance
- Better scalability with auto-scaling support
- Enhanced security with encryption at rest/transit
- Reduced operational complexity

## [2.0.0-develop.1](https://github.com/Setup-Automatizado/zedaapi/compare/v1.2.0-develop.3...v2.0.0-develop.1) (2025-12-20)

### ‚ö† BREAKING CHANGES

* **terraform:** Replace containerized data stores with AWS managed
services (RDS PostgreSQL, ElastiCache Redis, S3) for improved
reliability, scalability, and operational efficiency.

New Terraform Modules:
- RDS PostgreSQL with Multi-AZ, automated backups, encryption
- ElastiCache Redis with replication and automatic failover
- S3 buckets with versioning, encryption, lifecycle policies

Module Refactoring:
- ECS Service: Simplified to API-only container, removed Postgres/Redis/MinIO
- Security Groups: Added RDS and ElastiCache SGs, removed EFS
- Secrets Manager: Flexible payload structure per environment

Environment Migration:
Production:
- RDS db.r6g.large Multi-AZ, 100GB gp3, 7-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.r6g.large with 2 replicas
- S3 whatsmeow-production-media
- Cost: ~$575/month

Staging:
- RDS db.t4g.medium single-AZ, 20GB, 3-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small with 1 replica
- FARGATE_SPOT enabled
- Cost: ~$126/month

Homolog:
- RDS db.t4g.small single-AZ, 10GB, 1-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small no replicas
- FARGATE_SPOT, NAT Gateway disabled
- Cost: ~$84/month

Documentation:
- Updated architecture diagram with managed services
- New cost breakdown per environment
- Updated troubleshooting for RDS/ElastiCache/S3
- Removed EFS and container-based service documentation

Benefits:
- Automated backups and point-in-time recovery
- Managed patching and maintenance
- Better scalability with auto-scaling support
- Enhanced security with encryption at rest/transit
- Reduced operational complexity

## [2.0.0-develop.1](https://github.com/Setup-Automatizado/zedaapi/compare/v1.2.0-develop.3...v2.0.0-develop.1) (2025-11-13)

### ‚ö† BREAKING CHANGES

* **terraform:** Replace containerized data stores with AWS managed
services (RDS PostgreSQL, ElastiCache Redis, S3) for improved
reliability, scalability, and operational efficiency.

New Terraform Modules:
- RDS PostgreSQL with Multi-AZ, automated backups, encryption
- ElastiCache Redis with replication and automatic failover
- S3 buckets with versioning, encryption, lifecycle policies

Module Refactoring:
- ECS Service: Simplified to API-only container, removed Postgres/Redis/MinIO
- Security Groups: Added RDS and ElastiCache SGs, removed EFS
- Secrets Manager: Flexible payload structure per environment

Environment Migration:
Production:
- RDS db.r6g.large Multi-AZ, 100GB gp3, 7-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.r6g.large with 2 replicas
- S3 whatsmeow-production-media
- Cost: ~$575/month

Staging:
- RDS db.t4g.medium single-AZ, 20GB, 3-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small with 1 replica
- FARGATE_SPOT enabled
- Cost: ~$126/month

Homolog:
- RDS db.t4g.small single-AZ, 10GB, 1-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small no replicas
- FARGATE_SPOT, NAT Gateway disabled
- Cost: ~$84/month

Documentation:
- Updated architecture diagram with managed services
- New cost breakdown per environment
- Updated troubleshooting for RDS/ElastiCache/S3
- Removed EFS and container-based service documentation

Benefits:
- Automated backups and point-in-time recovery
- Managed patching and maintenance
- Better scalability with auto-scaling support
- Enhanced security with encryption at rest/transit
- Reduced operational complexity

- Cost: ~$575/month

Staging:
- RDS db.t4g.medium single-AZ, 20GB, 3-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small with 1 replica
- FARGATE_SPOT enabled
- Cost: ~$126/month

Homolog:
- RDS db.t4g.small single-AZ, 10GB, 1-day backups
- ElastiCache cache.t4g.small no replicas
- FARGATE_SPOT, NAT Gateway disabled
- Cost: ~$84/month

Documentation:
- Updated architecture diagram with managed services
- New cost breakdown per environment
- Updated troubleshooting for RDS/ElastiCache/S3
- Removed EFS and container-based service documentation

Benefits:
- Automated backups and point-in-time recovery
- Managed patching and maintenance
- Better scalability with auto-scaling support
- Enhanced security with encryption at rest/transit
- Reduced operational complexity
